result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Sandra Ann Miller

records.addlTxt: Status conference on November 15, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

9:32 AM Defendant Sandra Ann Miller in court.  Attorney Michael Scholke in court for Sandra Ann Miller.  Attorney Douglas J Drexler in court for State of Wisconsin. Court calls 21CF27, 22CF27 & 22CF28. Statement by State. Defendant is not competent. Defendant stipulates to competency. Defendant waives right to competency hearing. Court finds defendant is not competent. Court dismisses criminal proceedings. Statement by Court. Statement by State. Court orders defendant taken into custody and placed in locked nursing home. Court appoints Attorney Scholke as counsel for defendant. Court grants extension of time limits. No objections. Defendant waives time limits. Hearing to be set within 7 days and GAL appointed. Adj. 9:48am jjm
on Petition for Appointment of Attorney
Adjourned initial appearance on October 18, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Status conference on September 20, 2022 at 10:00 am.

09:45 AM Defendant Sandra Ann Miller in court.  Attorney Douglas J Drexler in court for State of Wisconsin. Defendant can't get funds to hire attorney. Court to appoint attorney.  adj. jjm
Status conference scheduled for September 20, 2022 at 10:00 am.

10:05 AM Prosecuting attorney Douglas J Drexler in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Sandra Ann Miller in court. Court calls 22CF27 & 22CF28. Statement by Court. Court advises defendant to hire private attorney, if bank won't give loan court may appoint an attorney. Must have something in writing from the bank. Adj. 10:16am jjm
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for September 6, 2022 at 09:45 am.
Adjourned initial appearance on September 6, 2022 at 09:45 am.
Initial appearance on August 2, 2022 at 10:00 am.
